name: special edition autumn island time blanket
notes:
special edition christmas & autumn island time blanket patterns

*****this pattern is available for free on my website at: 
https://www.nautikrallcrochet.com/blog-freepatterns/specialeditionautumnandchristmasislandtimexwecrochet
or
https://www.nautikrallcrochet.com/blog-freepatterns/autumnislandtime

a favourite of mine will always be the large sunburst granny square. it makes such an impact and truly is a delight to crochet. for those of you who are hesitant to start a granny square project for whatever the reason—i wanted to create a blanket for you to ease into. it starts with an adorable motif, chunky (think: “quick!”), and less squares to make in the end. this blanket has a total of 24 centres all worked in a solid colour so you need not be afraid of all those colour changes. it’s fun, it’s bold, it’s bright and it’s quick. what’s not to love?! 

this pattern is worked up using the large sunburst granny square. 
the pattern uses wecrochet mighty stitch super bulky (44yds/100g) and a 9mm hook.
or...
the pattern uses lion brand wool ease thick & quick super bulky yarn (106yds/170g) and a 9.00mm hook. 

pattern includes 4 downloads: the special edition autumn & christmas island time featuring wecrochet mighty stitch yarn as well as the autumn, christmas & halloween colour combos-all colours used and the yarn quantities as well as exact positioning. my gift to you is taking the work out of colourwork!


patterns will include:
- yarn amounts/quantities.
- yarn colours/colour legends
- alternative yarn suggestions/links
- stitch glossary.
- printable pdf of blanket graphs.
- full colour chart of all squares and their positioning so you can make this exact colour copies!
- full written instruction for the granny square used (large sunburst granny square).
- written and video tutorial for border and tassels.
- video tutorials for the granny square as well as the continuous join as you go method.

happy crocheting everyone!
l,
m
